text: So lets talk using the `<time>` element on a page for events that last more than one day, what does everyone do for this? Do you simply use the time tag twice or do you just use a `<time datetime="P3D">Jan 21 - 24th</time>` to indicate the number of days that the dates go? Trying to figure out the best way to do this as you cant really use the element for date ranges
wondering if best approach might just be using a `<time>` element with aria-labels to just read it out with "this event goes from X to Y date"
